channel.title: Omg elevatorrrr
channel.description:
So you remember those oldschool TODO IN ELEVATOR lists? Well here's my story.
Staying at a hotel in San Francisco, just got back like two days ago.
Anyways. Hotel. Elevator. Everytime we rode the elevator I made it a point to press as many floors as possible before getting off so it basically goes everywhere all the time lol. Kinda became an inside joke.
SOOO. I was doing this and the doors opened and I quickly stopped but I knew the guy saw me press one button. This is a nice looking guy, in a suit, presumably heading up the the top floor where they was a gay party. So we kinda rushed out and we hear: "HEY MAN that is FUCKED UP!" So I say okay let's walk faster. We dodge around the corner real quick and start to jog to the door and we hear him say: "BRO. HEY BRO. WHAT THE FUCK MAN"
So we RUN when we get outside towards China Town.
Nice little adreneline rush I guess. We were dying laughing later on. But at the moment we were like AH BAD IDEA.
And the last time I rode the elevator I was doing it again and some guy in a wheelchair was outside so I rolled him in and left him ROFLFLFLF

item.title: Omg elevatorrrr
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Sorry, this failed to amuse me.
Please insert another coin and try again.

Read full topic

item.title: Omg elevatorrrr
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

davidude36:

I don’t see what the big deal is with fitting these elevators with a “Clear” buttons you can just clear all the floors it is going to then select the one you are going to.

Surely you call them lifts?

Read full topic

item.title: Omg elevatorrrr
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:220423”]if i was the guy in the wheelchair, i don’t really think i’d mind. I’d just sit there and enjoy the trip

haha someone tried to mug me in an elevator once…i wont give details because nobody would believe me anyway :P[/quote]

Oh right, I’m online.
HAHAHA.
I think that’s the funniest phenomenon.

Read full topic

@Doggie3342 wrote:

davidude36:

I don’t see what the big deal is with fitting these elevators with a “Clear” buttons you can just clear all the floors it is going to then select the one you are going to.

well one problem would be that person A could be on floor 1, and get in and press the button for 10. person B gets in at floor 4, wants to get to 13 really quickly and is a douche. person B presses clear and then 14 and farts on person A.

item.title: Omg elevatorrrr
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Oh and we were trying that trick where you hold down your button for a while and it goes straight to your floor.

Don’t know if it actually worked or not because it was always stopping at ours anyways because it was kinda the midway to where everyone else was going.
